title: How to Make Rissoles

steps.headline: Heat the oil for a few minutes in the pan.
Put in all the cut up and grated vegetables and fry until very soft.
Add them into a bowl and let them cool.
Pick up little bits of the mixture into little balls.
Cook them in oil until nicely browned on each side.
Let them cool down and then serve with your favourite vegetables or side dishes.

text: Get out a frying pan.  Heat the oil for a few minutes in the pan.  Put in all the cut up and grated vegetables and fry until very soft.  Add them into a bowl and let them cool.  Add the meat minced up.  Add the breadcrumbs and egg.  Mix the mixture very well.  Pick up little bits of the mixture into little balls.  Cook them in oil until nicely browned on each side.  Let them cool down and then serve with your favourite vegetables or side dishes.
